stimulusHtml: Which of the following describes the resulting charge on the sphere?

features.html: A grounded spherical conductor is on an insulating stand. A positively charged rod is brought close to the sphere but does not touch the sphere, as shown. The rod is moved far away and then the grounding wire is removed.

choicesHtml: No net charge and no charge polarization
No net charge, but it is polarized with more negative charges on the left side of the sphere
